title: Apparently Kitties can sit in your lap in WoW
body:
That little purple guy is Blizzard's 2015 Make-A-Wish pet - basically every year they come out with a new pet for $10 at Christmas and donate 100% of the sales to Make-A-Wish.

Well, while messing around earlier in my Garrison I accidentally used the /sit command while targeting the little guy.

AND HE'LL SIT IN YOUR LAP!

http://i.imgur.com/GKWm9IE.jpg

AND IT WORKS WITH OTHER KITTIES TOO!

http://i.imgur.com/9TtcdoZ.jpg

(NOTE: Do not recommend with fire kitties. Owie.)

I spent like 30 minutes afterwards going through all my pets, but it only seems to work with the kitties. Which is still great.
